code: import{ActionTypes}from"../constants/action-types";export var setProducts=function setProducts(products){return{type:ActionTypes.SET_PRODUCTS,payload:products};};export var selectedProduct=function selectedProduct(product){return{type:ActionTypes.SELECTED_PRODUCT,payload:product};};export var removeSelectedProduct=function removeSelectedProduct(){return{type:ActionTypes.REMOVE_SELECTED_PRODUCT};};
